Class StaffMgr

java.lang.Object
staff.StaffMgr
public class StaffMgr extends Object
This is the controller class for the staff members.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ng Li Wang

      staffId - Id of the staff to be added
      name - name of the staff to be added

    • checkStaffId

      public boolean checkStaffId​(int staffId)
      checks if the staffId is already in the ArrayList, if yes, return true
      Parameters:
      staffId - the id of the staff member to be searched for
      Returns:
      boolean true if the staff member is found, false otherwise
